text: along with its grain offering of two-tenths of an ephah of fine flour 23:13 Two-tenths of an ephah is approximately 4 dry quarts or 4.4 liters (probably about 5.1 pounds or 2.3 kilograms of flour); also in verse 17. mixed with oil—an offering made by fire to the LORD, a pleasing aroma—and its drink offering of a quarter hin of wine.23:13 A quarter hin is approximately 0.97 quarts or 0.92 liters of wine.
